attributes.action: strip Rudy Giuliani of his Knighthood for not liking ferrets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Do we want a man who hates ferrets as a KBE? 

Please help sent a clear message to the American people that, due to his hatred at ferrets, Giuliani is unfit to hold office.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
